name: My Pet Rupreet
description:
Note : If you want to play the game Fullscreen please download the Windows version!

What is this thing? Well, it's in your own care now... Will you adore or abuse it?     What could possibly go wrong...? What is the game about?

Once upon a time, there was a human who was feeling depressed and trying to come up with ways to get themselves out of this zone. Before suddenly, they notice a strange old man planting something in their backyard! What did he plant in your garden? Who is this mysterious old man? What the F%#@ is a Rupreet?!?

This game was made for 'Virtual Pet' Game Jam~  Features & Guide ⬥ Features:

⟡  Take care of your very own Rupreet!

⟡  A fun dance minigame that always bears fruit!

⟡  A game with different outcomes based on your actions!

⬥ Quick Guide:

⟡  Use the Left Click to Play the Game

⟡  Use the Mouse Scroll Wheel to navigate through Dialogs

⟡ Drag and drop Food and Water to your Rupreet

⟡ Interact with it to send it to sleep or perform the Fruit Dance to get some more Food
